## About me

I'm a **3rd year IT student** from **Switzerland**. I am learning IT and I am much interested in Web development. In my free time I like to code and learn new languages or improve them. But I also make music in a brass band and in winter, I like to go snowboarding.

## currently working on

- personal Website
- sgrumisberg.ch
- mgrumisberg.ch
- todolist

## learn more about these projects

### personal Website

This is my personal website. It is written in **React** with **TypeScript**. It will be deployed later with **Vercel**. My Goal is to learn React and TypeScript and create my first personal website.
This site got published on 29th of July 2022 on [https://chraebsli.dev](https://chraebsli.dev) and [https://nicholas-krebs.ch](https://nicholas-krebs.ch).

![React](https://img.shields.io/badge/-React-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=react)
![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/-TypeScript-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=typescript)
![Vercel](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Vercel-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=Vercel)

### sgrumisberg.ch

This is a website for a society in my village called "SchÃ¼tzengesellschaft Rumisberg". The Website uses the CMS **Grav** and is deployed on **Heroku**. You can view it here: [https://sgrumisberg.ch](https://sgrumisberg.ch)

![Grav](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Grav-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=grav)
![Php](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Php-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=php)
![Heroku](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Heroku-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=heroku)

### mgrumisberg.ch

This is also website for a society in my village, but I am a member of it. Our Brass Band needs a new Website. I will create the website using **Grav** and **Heroku** again.

![Grav](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Grav-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=grav)
![Php](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Php-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=php)
![Heroku](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Heroku-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=heroku)

### Todolist

To learn some new technologies, I am building this webapp. I will use **Next.js**, **TypeScript** and **Prisma**.

![Next.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Next.js-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=next.js)
![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/-TypeScript-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=typescript)
![Prisma](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Prisma-black?style=for-the-badge&logo=prisma)
